org.araneaframework.uilib.tree
Interface TreeRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TreeTag.StandardTreeRenderer
public interface TreeRenderer
extends Serializable

Tree widget renderer.

Since:
1.0.7
Author:
Alar Kvell (alar@araneaframework.org)

renderChildrenStart

void renderChildrenStart(Writer out,
                         TreeNodeContext node)
                         throws Exception
Renders HTML after DisplayWidget and before child nodes. Called only if there are child nodes and they are not collapsed.

node - tree node that is being rendered
Throws:
Exception

renderChildrenEnd

                       TreeNodeContext node)
                       throws Exception

renderChildEnd

                    TreeNodeContext node,
                    TreeNodeContext childNode)
                    throws Exception
Renders HTML immediately after each child node.

Parameters:

renderDisplayPrefix

void renderDisplayPrefix(Writer out,
                         TreeNodeContext node,
                         boolean current)
                         throws Exception
Renders HTML before DisplayWidget's toggle link. Called for each TreeNodeWidget, staring from TreeWidget. Usually overridden.

Parameters:
node - tree node that is being rendered
current - if this TreeNodeWidget's DisplayWidget is about to be rendered
Throws:
Exception
